# chat-gpt-search

[![license](https://img.shields.io/github/license/zhengbangbo/chat-gpt-userscript?color=blue)](https://github.com/zhengbangbo/chat-gpt-userscript/blob/main/LICENSE)
[![](https://img.shields.io/static/v1?label=%20&message=GreasyFork&style=flat&labelColor=5D5D5D&color=000000&logo=data:image/png;base64,)](https://greasyfork.org/scripts/456077)

A userscript to display ChatGPT answer alongside Search results(Google/Bing/Baidu/DuckDuckGo)

![screenshot.jpg](https://github.com/zhengbangbo/chat-gpt-userscript/raw/main/screenshot.jpg)

## Installation

1. Read [this help document](https://greasyfork.org/help/installing-user-scripts) to install the user script manager.

2. Go to [Greasy Fork](https://greasyfork.org/scripts/456077) install the userscript.

## Credit

This project is inspired by [wong2/chat-gpt-google-extension](https://github.com/wong2/chat-gpt-google-extension).
